channel.title: No-ip help
channel.description:
i yes ive downloaded the no-ip duc client i set the 1 i want by ticking it and when ever i try to connect with that ip it doesent connect i cant open the server unless ppl can connect
please help
1. I registered 2. I added my host 3. I ticked it updated it 4. I tryed to connect it wouldnt work
p.s i know ive posted alot
but please help

item.title: No-ip help
item.dc:creator: @boomer4456 boomer4456
item.description:
@boomer4456 wrote:

[quote=“Pricescape, post:1, topic:222950”]i yes ive downloaded the no-ip duc client i set the 1 i want by ticking it and when ever i try to connect with that ip it doesent connect i cant open the server unless ppl can connect

please help

  1. I registered
  2. I added my host
  3. I ticked it updated it
  4. I tryed to connect it wouldnt work

p.s i know ive posted alot

but please help[/quote] ok click the box next to ur ip in no-ip client 2nd make sure you portfowarded corretly 3rd ur not gona be able to connect to your server if other pepole can use ur no-ip use local host just type ur username and password and leave the server part blank and ur using local host right there once you have the box check try to use local host you not gona be able to use ur no-ip to connect to ur server because ur router or modem will block you but other pepole will if you portfowarded correctly

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip help
item.dc:creator: @Darn-Adams-no-1 Darn-Adams-no-1
item.description:
@Darn-Adams-no-1 wrote:

you need to portforward thts what part i am stuck on if u just want to go on and try it out put in 0.0.0.0 or leave it black i recomend not using a private client

Read full topic
